bike.description: 06 P-frame, 6061-T6 alloy, Freeride HT Dirt Jumping/ Street/MTB design, double butted ORE DT and TT, forged/releived " " HT and ISCG BB, 6mm offset rear triangle and forged horizontal drop-outs with integrated chain tensioner and replaceable der hanger

components.description: Marzocchi Dirt Jam Pro SL, 110mm "Disc" model, SSV dampening, 1-piece magnesium lower, Cr-Mo steerer, black alloy 32mm stanchions, cold forged alloy crown, coil spring w/ air assist
Truvativ Hussefelt, forged stem, 7 degree x 40mm, 31.8mm bar clamp
Specialized alloy riser, OS 31.8mm , 45mm rise, 8 degree upsweep, 6 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Hayes Sole, hydraulic disc, 160mm V-cut rotor
Hayes Sole, hydraulic disc, 160mm V-cut rotor
Truvativ Hussefelt, 6066 with howitzer interface and Truvativ XR box guide chain guide
Truvativ Howitzer Team, 57mm chainline, external alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized alloy platform, molded pins, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle
Joy Tech disc, 36 hole, nutted axle
Joy Tech disc, cassette 36 hole, nutted axle
Specialized Rhythm 26x2.3", 60TPI, dual compound with wire bead
Specialized Rhythm 26x2.3", 60TPI, dual compound with wire bead
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
